channel.title: Summon-Pkz Cleaned Project Czar BETA - Added alot of Features to it
channel.description:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/summonpkz2.png[/img]
About a month ago, I was getting really bored with my server. So, I thought I might make a little side project as well as my normal server. I picked Project Czar, because everyone is always Complaning it sucks and only shit Coders use it, so I thought I will make a project Czar source and make it Better than any other. So far I have cleaned it, which means I have removed all Nearly All of the NPC's that were there before, removed all objects and added about 5 of my own, removed about 400kb out of client.java, and added about 200kb of my own stuff into it. This is just a The cleaned version, of what is to come 2-3 months in the future, when the FULL thing is finished and I will Probably Buy a VPS for it, then a couple months after that, I will release it to the public, for people to use.
[u][b]General Statistics[/b][/u]
[ul][li][i]Removed 400kb of Worthless junk out of Client.java.[/i][/li] [li][i]Added about 200kb of my Own stuff into Client.java.[/i][/li] [li][i]Added Five New classes, including A Fletching Handler.[/i][/li] [li][i]When I downloaded Project Czar, it was 4.8mb.[/i][/li] [li][i]This is now 3mb, But the .RAR File is 575kb.[/i][/li] [li][i]Added a New .CFG File - NPCEmotes.[/i][/li] [li][i]Deleted some useless files in the Folder.[/i][/li] [li][i]Removed 3/4 out of the TextHandler class.[/i][/li][/ul]
[u][b] Features[/b][/u]
[ul][li][i]Added a Nice thieving base, you randomly get hit when you pickpocket, and It does the correct GFX, with the birds flying round above your head.[/i][/li] [li][i]Rearanged Varrock east Bank.[/i][/li] [li][i]Added the correct shops for each town, but some towns/cities are not added yet, such as camelot and catherby.[/i][/li] [li][i]Added an NPCAggression Class, which I will use to make NPC's in the wilderness aggressive, and also NPC's like the Kalphite queen, and the Tzhaar NPC's in the Fight cave.[/i][/li] [li][i]Added Fully working Following, But it glitches if you have run on, while following.[/i][/li] [li][i]Fixed up the Applydead method, to make Perfect Death.[/i][/li] [li][i]Added FULL teleportation, both normal, and Ancient spells, with Perfect timers, and correct Teleport Areas, with Full level, and rune requirements, not added requirements for levels or runes for the Ancient teleport spells yet though.[/i][/li] [li][i]Fixed the Projectiles, which came in Project Czar V1.1, I deleted those ones, and created my own, which are Much better than the old ones.[/i][/li] [li][i]Fixed the Special attack GFX's and emotes.[/i][/li] [li][i]Added Alot of Walk animations & Run animations.[/i][/li] [li][i]You now do the Blocking emote from the getBlockAnim method, when fighting a player.[/i][/li] [li][i]Added FULL Prayer switching, not added the statistics yet though.[/i][/li] [li][i]The prayer switching works for every spell, for Example, if you had the 'Skin' prayer on, and you clicked on the 'Rock' prayer, it would turn the Other prayer off.[/i][/li] [li][i]Fixed Up woodcutting, you now Receive logs when woodcutting, and when cutting a normal tree, the tree disapears exactly when you have cut the log.[/i][/li] [li][i]Added firemaking, that it Lights the fire, like 2 secs after you use the Tinderbox on the Logs.[/i][/li] [li][i]Nearly All ShopKeepers/Non fighting NPC's have NPC Dialogue, with options to open up the shop or w/e. [/i][/li] [li][i]Thessalia has the option to Change your appearance in her NPC Dialogue.[/i][/li] [li][i]There will be less lag now, because all objects have been removed apart from the lumbridge bank, and the varrock east bank objects.[/i][/li] [li][i]Ice Barrage doesn't poison you anymore, it shouldn't have been added in the first place ..[/i][/li] [li][i]This DOES Have a client to go with it, but you can make yourselves one, I am not making everything for you.[/i][/li] [li][i]The towns Have been files with the correct NPC's.[/i][/li] [li][i]These Towns/Cities include varrock, lumbridge, falador, ardougne, and a small bit of catherby.[/i][/li] [li][i]There is now no need to keep adding Areas into the nonWild method, I have created a new Wild() method, which makes the whole of the non-wilderness, Safe, and you may not attack anyone.[/i][/li] [li][i]FULL High Alchemy, with Anti mass, and Perfect Magic interface Switchback Timer.[/ul]
There are many more features, search for them yourself throughout the server. 10X at least more features will Come in the FULL Version of this, released in 2-4 months hopefully.
[size=15pt][u][b]Filled Towns[/b][/u][/size]
[b][size=13pt]Varrock - 95% Lumbridge - 55% Falador - 80% Ardougne - 50% Camelot - 0% Catherby - 10% Edgeville - 0% Dranor Village - 0% Canifis - 0%[/size][/b]
[size=10pt][b] Download:[/b][/size]
[url=http://uppit.com/VVZ6MB] [img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/download-button.gif[/img][/url]
The Pictures.
Ranged Drawback:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/drawback.jpg[/img]
Ranged Projectile:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Projectile.jpg[/img]
Some NPC Dialogue:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/generalstore.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Thessalia.gif[/img]
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/cassie.gif[/img]
Prayer Switching:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/prayerswitching.gif[/img]
Woodcutting:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/wcing.gif[/img]
Alching:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Alching.gif[/img]
Alching Magic bar timer set back:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Alchsetsidebar.gif[/img]
Teleportation (normal magics):
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/FullTeleport.gif[/img]
Teleportation (Ancient magics):
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/AncientsTele.gif[/img]
And finally, the Virus scan:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Virusscan.jpg[/img]
